title: Bug 17001JUnit preference page margins too wide
description: Bug 17001JUnit preference page margins too wide
OB: Build: 20020521The left, right, top and bottom margins on the JUnit preference page are toowide. They are inconsistent with the other preference pages.
SR: Adding thefollowing lines in JUnitPreferencePage.createContents(Composite) will fix thisproblem:layout.marginWidth = 0;layout.marginHeight = 0;
